name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, launch haiku reader”
”Alexa, open haiku reader”
”Alexa, use haiku reader”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader has a library of haiku poems about life’s simple pleasures. The haikus can be read aloud at random by Alexa from any Amazon-enabled device.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
